messages.title: ONLY THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS CAN CHANGE BRITAIN'S FUTURE
LABOUR'S BREXIT BETRAYAL
messages.content: LABOUR VOTED WITH UKIP AND TORIES FOR BREXIT.

messages.title: Five more years of Theresa May means a more heartless and divided Britain.
messages.content: Corbyn’s Labour is too weak and divided to win this election.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight dangerous impact of Brexit. LABOUR VOTED WITH UKIP AND TORIES FOR BREXIT. Labour's Brexit Betrayal.
issues.health: 1p on Income Tax to boost our NHS

quotes.text: Corbyn to order Labour MPs to vote for Article 50.
Labour drawing up plans to work with Theresa May over Brexit.
Corbyn will not back second EU referendum.
Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition.

images.caption: A man speaking with a woman and a child. 'Fight dangerous impact of Brexit', '1p on Income Tax to boost our NHS', 'Protect funding for our schools'
Images of Theresa May, Jeremy Corbyn, and Nigel Farage with the text 'LABOUR'S BREXIT BETRAYAL CHANGE BRITAIN'S FUTURE. VOTE LIB DEM.'
Arrows pointing downwards with text 'Five more years of Theresa May means a more heartless and divided Britain.' and 'Corbyn’s Labour is too weak and divided to win this election.'
